long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We’re excited to introduce MimicAI, the 100% free Chrome extension that keeps your emails secure—without the hassle of blocked messages!

Neil and I (two college students with a passion for solving real problems) built this tool to tackle phishing attacks head-on. We spent our nights and weekends on it and would love to get your feedback. Follow on twitter for the behind the scenes: https://x.com/jack_mitchell01

💡 Our Story

We all get bombarded by spam and phishing emails—50% of cybercrime victims fell for a phishing attack in 2021. Even with top engineers fighting the good fight at Google, phishing emails still make it through. So we thought, why not try a different approach?

With MimicAI, you’ll receive a probability score that tells you how likely an email is malicious, allowing you to stay in control without blocking any important messages. This has a ton of benefits such as…

🌟 Key Benefits

- Risk Score: Know instantly if an email is suspicious with our AI-powered risk score.

- Never Miss an Email: We don’t block anything—every email is delivered, and you’re given the tools to evaluate each message.

- Cybersecurity Culture: Create a culture of security by understanding exactly why an email might be risky.

- 100% Privacy: Your emails are never stored. We guarantee your complete privacy.

👥 Who’s It For?

- Small businesses needing an affordable cybersecurity solution.
- Individuals concerned about phishing and AI-generated scams.
- Anyone who fears losing out to a cyberattack.

🌍 Our Vision

Our goal is simple: If we can prevent just one person from getting hacked, we’d be thrilled. We’re offering this tool for free because we know security should be accessible to everyone—especially businesses without big budgets.

💬 We Want Your Feedback!

MimicAI is constantly evolving, and we want to hear from you. Email us your thoughts at mimic.dev@gmail.com. Your feedback will shape the future of the tool!
